      public String searchBoardGame()
      Asks user for min and max players of board game and assigns to respective variables saves the min and max with hyphen in the numOfPlayers variable
      Returns:
      the numOfPlayers which has the min and max

      public int whichToy()
      Prompts user asking which toy to would they like to purchase
      Returns:
      the user's choice of toy

    • addNewFigure

      public String addNewFigure() throws NegativeException
      Asks user to enter each characteristic of the new figure validates their input and saves to respective variable Concatenates all the characteristics into one variable with commas
      Returns:
      the characteristics of the figure as newToy
      Throws:
      NegativeException - a custom exception if the user's price is negative

    • addNewAnimal

      public String addNewAnimal() throws NegativeException
      Asks user to enter each characteristic of the new animal toy validates their input and saves to respective variable Concatenates all the characteristics into one variable with commas
      Returns:
      the characteristics of the animal toy as newToy
      Throws:
      NegativeException - a custom exception if the user's price is negative

    • addNewPuzzle

      public String addNewPuzzle() throws NegativeException
      Asks user to enter each characteristic of the new puzzle validates their input and saves to respective variable Concatenates all the characteristics into one variable with commas
      Returns:
      the characteristics of the puzzle as newToy
      Throws:
      NegativeException - a custom exception if the user's price is negative

    • addNewBoardGame

      public String addNewBoardGame() throws NegativeException, MinPlayersException
      Asks user to enter each characteristic of the new board game validates their input and saves to respective variable Concatenates all the characteristics into one variable with commas
      Returns:
      the characteristics of the board game as newToy
      Throws:
      NegativeException - a custom price exception if the user's price is negative
      MinPlayersException - a custom players exception if the min players is greater than the max players of the board game

    • removeToy

      public char removeToy()
      Asks user if they would like to remove a toy
      Returns:
      the user's choice as a char

      public void closingMsg()
